Conor Marie Leslie (amụrụ na April 10, na afọ 1991) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri. Malite ọrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 2000, ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri Chained (nke afọ 2012)

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na telivishọn, gụnyere dị ka usoro na-aga n'ihu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Discovery Channel Western Klondike (2014), Yahoo! Ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị na-atọ ọchị Other Space (2015), na ihe nkiri mpụ Fox Shots Fired (2017)
Site na 2015 ruo 2018, ọ pụtakwara na oge atọ mbụ nke Amazon Prime Video ọzọ akụkọ ihe mere eme The Man in the High Castle
Leslie nwetakwara ọganihu maka igosipụta Donna Troy / Wonder Girl na DC Universe / HBO Max superhero series Titans (2018[[present), nke ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị isi na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe oge nke abụọ.

A mụrụ Leslie na Livingston, New Jersey ma biri na Millburn. Tinyere ime ihe nkiri, Leslie zụlitere mmasị na ese foto. Ọ gara Millburn High School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-eto eto na 2008, ma mesịa kwaga New York City.
